title:  buttons
author: rob@nexuspoint.co.uk
    

#   Useage


```

    <h1>Standard Buttons</h1>

    <button>Plain Button</button>
    <button class="primary">Primary Button</button>
    <button class="secondary">Secondary Button</button>
    <button class="misc">Other Button</button>




    <h1>Rounded Buttons</h1>
    
    <button class="rounded">Rounded Button</button>
    <button class="primary rounded">Rounded Primary Button</button>
    <button class="secondary rounded">Rounded Secondary Button</button>
    <button class="misc rounded">Rounded Other Button</button>




    <h1>Standard Buttons With Dropshadow</h1>

    <button class="shadow">Dropshadow Plain Button</button>
    <button class="primary shadow">Dropshadow Primary Button</button>
    <button class="secondary shadow">Dropshadow Secondary Button</button>
    <button class="misc shadow">Dropshadow Other Button</button>




    <h1>Rounded Buttons With Dropshadow</h1>
    
    <button class="rounded shadow">Rounded Button</button>
    <button class="primary rounded shadow">Rounded Primary Button</button>
    <button class="secondary rounded shadow">Rounded Secondary Button</button>
    <button class="misc rounded shadow">Rounded Other Button</button>




    <h1>Outline Buttons</h1>
    
    <button class="outline">Outline Button</button>
    <button class="primary outline">Outline Primary Button</button>
    <button class="secondary outline">Outline Button</button>
    <button class="misc outline">Outline Other Button</button>

```
